segments.text: Excuse me , miss.Should I check in here for taking MS121 to Florence ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , show me your ticket and passport please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are . Can I have a seat in the back of the plane ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . Wish you a nice trip .
segments.speaker: S2
